Package sailpoint.object

Class OAuthConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      • sailpoint.object.OAuthConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject
    public class OAuthConfiguration
extends AbstractXmlObject
    Represents a single OAuth configuration for a set of OAuth client objects. There should only be one OAuth configuration per deployment. Multiple OAuthClient objects are children of this element.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static int DEFAULT_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN_SECONDS
      default access token expires in 20 minutes

      • getAccessTokenExpiresInSeconds

        public java.lang.Integer getAccessTokenExpiresInSeconds()
        Returns:
        Global configuration applied to every access token granted. Used as the value of the access token response field "expires_in".

      • setAccessTokenExpiresInSeconds

        public void setAccessTokenExpiresInSeconds​(java.lang.Integer accessTokenExpiresInSeconds)

      • getRefreshTokenExpiresInSeconds

        public java.lang.Integer getRefreshTokenExpiresInSeconds()
        Returns:
        Global configuration used to validate a refresh token request. This configuration allows for slightly longer "expires_in" values than what an access token normally would grant.

      • setRefreshTokenExpiresInSeconds

        public void setRefreshTokenExpiresInSeconds​(java.lang.Integer refreshTokenExpiresInSeconds)

      • getOAuthClients

        public java.util.List<OAuthClient> getOAuthClients()
        Returns:
        a list of configured OAuthClient objects

      • setOAuthClients

        public void setOAuthClients​(java.util.List<OAuthClient> oAuthClients)

      • getClient

        public OAuthClient getClient​(java.lang.String id)
        Returns an OAuthClient by id
        Parameters:
        id - id of the client
        Returns:
        OAuthClient or null if one is not found

      • addClient

        public void addClient​(OAuthClient client)
        Adds an OAuthClient to the list of OAuthClients
        Parameters:
        client - client to add, must not be null

      • deleteClient

        public OAuthClient deleteClient​(java.lang.String clientId)
        Removes an OAuthClient from the list of OAuthClients
        Parameters:
        clientId - Id of the client to delete
        Returns:
        OAuthClient the deleted client
